refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function sets MicroDAQ AO outputs. An array or single channel number has to be provided as a 'channels' parameter. The 'data' parameter contais AO voltage values.

listitem.para: channels: Single channel or array of channels numbers to read
data : Array or single voltage Analog Output (AO) value

refsection.title: Examples
